elem.description: This block represents three-phase short circuit that triggers at T_on moment of simulation time.
elem.name: Three phase fault

Equations.equ: p1.p = Z + if(gr(time, fTime), R_on, R_off)*p1.f
p2.p = Z + if(gr(time, fTime), R_on, R_off)*p2.f
p3.p = Z + if(gr(time, fTime), R_on, R_off)*p3.f
